Topic.Title: How long before my game is moderated?

Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm not really that new, but I don't make games a whole lot, and I was just curious how long until my game would be added with a category to the site. I want to share it, but I really want it to be fully moderated and categorized. Anyone know how long it takes for that to happen regularly? Also, could I become a moderator? I really would like to help anyone else with this problem in the future.
Posts.HTML: Hi, I'm not really that new, but I don't make games a whole lot, and I was just curious how long until my game would be added with a category to the site. I want to share it, but I really want it to be fully moderated and categorized. Anyone know how long it takes for that to happen regularly? Also, could I become a moderator? I really would like to help anyone else with this problem in the future.

Posts.EditableText: I'm assuming the game has been placed since this post?  I searched and found two games.  Both are in categories already.  Let me know.  Thanks.
Posts.HTML: I'm assuming the game has been placed since this post? I searched and found two games. Both are in categories already. Let me know. Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: Yes it has, thank you very much.
Posts.HTML: Yes it has, thank you very much.
